tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am writing on behalf of my mother who underwent the operation(s). Yes, you read it right! She had both her knees operated on and on two separate occasions as she did not want both knees to be operated at the same time. As I live half way across the globe and due to work constraints, I was unable to be with her and had to rely on the extended family's support. But more importantly, I wanted to know that she was going to the right doctor! Based on family and friends recommendation, I had strongly suggested to mom that she go to a different doctor. I had even met the 'other' doctor (who shall remain unnamed). But she had a good friend and a neighbor who had recently had the same operation successfully completed by Dr. Sharath and so mom felt very inclined to go to this doctor. I was very apprehensive and so I decided to talk to the doctor (over the phone). I had a list of questions for the doctor to which the doctor very patiently answered and gave me such a good feeling that I too was convinced that mom had made the right choice in this doctor! All from 10,000 miles away. So, fast forward 6 months, following two total knee replacement surgery, which the doctor has informed me is called as staggered as it was operated on with a time gap of about 6 months in-between, mom is currently recovering from her 2nd TKR and the doctor is so amazing that I am so very humbled by his approach to his patients and their family. He is so concerned for his patients well being and genuinely a very good doctor. I recommend him highly and will continue to sing his praises to everyone that will listen. I wish Dr. Sharath and his family the best of everything that life has to offer. Thank you doc!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi Everyone,

Greetings...

I was recommended a Total Hip Replacement Surgery in July 2019, due to some past injury commonly known as AVN (Avascular Necrosis). I had great difficulties walking, sitting, lying down & even travelling. Walking was very embarrassing, coz I had developed a limp gradually without realizing.  I had to quit my work due, in ability to travel.

After consulting several surgeons in Bangalore, I was referred to Dr Sharath in Ramaiah Hospital. He was very kind and offered to consult, though it was not his day for Consultation.

He just went through my X-ray, immediately gave me a date for admission and surgery. And said very confidently, these exact words “I’ll fix it”.

I went through the surgery in Ramaiah Hospital on the 31st of August 2019. And he kept his word, fixed me both physically & mentally. I recovered swiftly, comparatively and doing great since September 2019. I’m back to my regular life and activities, I didn’t go through any kind of post operative pain or stress or physiotherapy just followed up with the recommended out patient consultations and care.

Dr. Sharath K Ramanath in his “Profession is Perfection @ it’s BEST”.

I wish him well with his Future Accomplishments.


Regards
Rabi
*** **** *** *** ***** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very brilliant doctor. I visited many hospitals for my joint swelling and pains. He diagnosed my seronegative Rheumatoid Arthritis through MRI . He suggested immediately a good Rhumatoligist . Now I am slowly recovering. Thank you doctor for diagnosing the problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My father was not able to walk due to a condition called ankylosing spondylitis.  His both hip s were fused. 
He was having severe pain. Dr sharath performed both hip replacement surgery of my father.
Now he is able to fold the  hips and pain free. Surgery is successful. 
Thanks to Dr sharath sir.
** **  *** **** *** ********** ** *** *********** *** **** *** ** **** ****** Many many thanks....

review:
“Dr. Sharath was extremely thorough with diagnosing my knee problem and my by birth defect.“Although the knee replacement was the most difficult medical procedure I have experienced, Dr. Sharath and his team took care of me so well. I would recommend Dr. Sharath to anyone needing similar attention.”We appreciate his kindness, concern, and care he showed.

Thank you

review: Dr sharath has done my left hip replacement surgery.I Belive that I got my second life becoz of him I don't have words he is such a great doctor with great experience when I went to him I was not able to sit or walk after getting surgery of left hip replacement now I m able to walk 3 to 4km I m able drive I m able to do all things normally it's like wonder I believe he is a magician of my life he did surgery in such a way that really wonderful I m seeing him from past 5years he is so friendly and best doctor for ortho in the world....i m so thankful to u sir...highly recommend for ortho patients..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I strongly recommend Sharat Dr for any kind of knee surgery.. he is very experienced professional who explains the medical condition and guide us to go for best treatment. my mom under went TKR for one leg.. surgery was successful without Any complications and she recovered well.. It's been 5 months now, she  can walk well and bend her knee well. Dr is reachable at all times when ever necessary.. he clarifies all misconceptions if you have any. So, if you are looking for a successful Knee replacement surgery for your lived ones, you can consult Dr Sharat without any hesitation.

I got Pcl reconstruction surgery done by dr sharath . Now after surgery results are good i am able to walk comfortably and i am happy. Thanks to dr sharath  for the treatment
